parts.text: This is it! Finally!
parts.speaker: kai

parts.text: Why do I feel like I'm the only one excited!?
parts.speaker: kai

parts.text: Well Kai, that's because you are. -smirks-
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: Oh c'mon Klaus, you are too!
parts.speaker: lythe

parts.text: Look at your hands, they're shaking!
parts.speaker: lythe

parts.text: Knowing Klaus.. He was up all night triple checking his school supplies...
parts.speaker: jute

parts.text: Not funny Jute! Being prepared is.. Very important!
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: I hope I get earth. I'm not sure if I could take care of any other kind of familiar.
parts.speaker: orubo

parts.text: Orubo, I think any familiar that ends up with you will be very lucky. -smiles-
parts.speaker: lythe

parts.text: Unless it's something other than earth.. .. ..
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: Quite the comedian Klaus.. At least Orubo knows what he wants...
parts.speaker: jute

parts.text: Fire! I want fire!
parts.speaker: kai

parts.text: Our school counselor said I'm pretty much guaranteed to get fire!
parts.speaker: kai

parts.text: I'm sure you will Kai! You certainly have a fiery spirit!
parts.speaker: lythe

parts.text: Not funny Jute! Being prepared is.. Very important!
parts.speaker: lythe

parts.text: Not really sure what my spirit would be considered.
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: But I'll be happy no matter what I get!
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: Step 1, get a Familiar.
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: Step 2, become the Legendary Klaus, Libra of Statae Academy! Muahaha!
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: It's our first year Klaus.. I think you skipped some steps..
parts.speaker: jute
